headline: Chevron Bets on Venezuela Oil to Unlock Up to $700M in Cash Flow
summary: CVX is accelerating Venezuelan crude exports to ease storage bottlenecks and unlock up to $700 million in annual cash flow amid shifting geopolitics.

headline: Zacks Value Trader Highlights: Borg Warner, General Motors, Phillips 66, Adient and Sirius XM
summary: Borg Warner leads a fresh list of classic value picks for 2026, as low valuations and earnings growth put beaten-down stocks back in focus.

headline: Phillips 66: A Winner In The Venezuela Sweepstakes (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Phillips 66 benefits from Venezuelan crude exposure, WRB acquisition, LA closure, complexity advantages, and $5B EBITDA. See why PSX stock is upgraded to buy.
